description: Defines a Flutter widget RatingsTab that displays a list of market ratings, fetched from MarketProvider, with features like pull-to-refresh and custom rating badges.

classes.name: RatingsTab
classes.description: A stateless Flutter widget that displays a list of ratings for market symbols with refresh capabilities.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for RatingsTab, displaying a list of market ratings with pull-to-refresh feature.
